content: प्रयुज् {c7c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To use, employ. अयमपि च गिरं नस्त्वत्प्रबोधयुक्तां <ls>R. 5. 74</ls>; सद्भावे साधुभावे च सदित्येतत्प्रयुज्यते <ls>Bg. 17. 26.</ls> {@--2@} To appoint, employ, direct, order; मा मां प्रयुंक्थाः कुलकीर्तिलोपे <ls>Bk. 3. 54</ls>; प्रायुक्त राज्ये बत दुष्करे त्वां <ls n="Bk.">3. 51</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 85.</ls> {@--3@} To give, bestow, confer; आशिषं प्रयुयुजे न वाहिनीं <ls>R. 11. 6</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 70</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 35</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 8.</ls> {@--4@} To move, set in motion; मरुत्प्रयुक्ताः (बाललताः) <ls>R. 2. 10.</ls> {@--5@} To excite, urge, prompt, drive on, अथावमानेन पितुः प्रयुक्ता <ls>Ku. 1. 21</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 36.</ls> {@--6@} To perform, do; <ls>Ku. 7. 86</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">17. 12.</ls> {@--7@} To represent on the stage, act, per. form; उत्तरं रामचरितं तत्प्रणीतं प्रयोक्ष्यते <ls>U. 1. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 35</ls>; परिषदि प्रयुंजानस्य मम <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--8@} To lend for use, put to interest (as money &c.,); <ls>Ms. 8. 146.</ls> {@--9@} To harness, yoke. {@--10@} To appoint, invest, install (in an office.) {@--11@} To cast, hurl, throw (as a missile); direct; प्रयुक्तमप्यस्त्रनितो वृथा स्यात् <ls>R. 2. 34.</ls> {@--12@} To be fit, become. {@--13@} To impose, inflict (with <ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>gen.</ab> of person). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To use, employ; <ls>Ms. 3. 112.</ls> {@--2@} To exact (as, interest) {@--3@} To perform, practise.
प्रयुज् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Impulse, motive, cause. {@--2@} Acquisition, gain.
